text: The president and board chair of the Chicago-based Poetry Foundation have resigned after more than 1,800 people signed an open letter denouncing the Foundation for failing to do more to support Black and other marginalized artists. https://t.co/EKMn1Vdeep

text: "Justice in America requires more than improving law enforcement. We cannot put racism behind us until we invest in opportunities for education, medical care, jobs, and affordable housing," writes U.S. Sen. Dick Durbin. https://t.co/LYHeI25DXG
